feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 01:41 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
